document_data.name: ''Shichi's Katana''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Shichi's katana''''' was the holy magical [[katana]] of [[Shichi No Ken]], a [[paladin]] of [[Amaterasu]], in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: It was a ''+3 katana'' that could [[detect evil]] at will, [[remove curse|remove a curse]] thrice a day, [[cure serious wounds]] on another (not the wielder) once day, and [[banishment|banish]] extraplanar beings with but a touch once every seven days. Moreover, it was a holy sword: in the hands of a paladin and unsheathed, it emanated a "circle of power" {{SI|30|ft|long=yes}} wide that dispelled all lesser hostile magic.
document_data.History: Along with [[Shichi's daikyu|a daikyu]], the sword was enchanted and gifted to Shichi by the Grand Master of Flowers when she departed the [[Seven Roses Monastery]] in Pe Nok to become a "walking initiate".
